items.content_html: T-manager is a lightweight web application designed for teams to collaborate on tasks efficiently. It provides an intuitive interface for task management, allowing users to create, assign, and update tasks in real-time.

items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
